description: Roshigumi was special police founded by the Bakufu in order to steer thugs into fighting against Joi rebels. While the organization began as a lost cause with constant infighting, after its co-founder, Sasaki Isaburou abandoned the project in favour of founding his own special police (Mimawarigumi), Kondou Isao reformed the organisation into Shinsengumi.
name: Roshigumi
